All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBook
Command to add a new book to the library system.
AddBookWindow
 
AddPatron
Command for adding a new patron to the library system.
AddPatronWindow
 
Book
The Book class represents a book in the library.
Book.Status
 
BookDataManager
Manages loading and storing book data from/to a text file.
BooksListView
This class is responsible for displaying the books in a graphical interface.
BookTest
 
BorrowBook
The BorrowBook class represents a command to borrow a book by a patron in the library system.
ButtonEditor
The ButtonEditor class represents a custom cell editor for a JTable that contains buttons.
ButtonRenderer
Custom table cell renderer that displays a button in a table cell.
CliMessageDisplayer
 
Command
 
CommandParser
The CommandParser class is responsible for parsing user input into specific Command objects.
Controller
 
DataManager
The DataManager interface defines methods for loading and storing data for a library system.
DataParserValidator
The DataParserValidator class provides methods for parsing and validating data.
DeleteBookWindow
 
DeletePatronWindow
 
GuiMessageDisplayer
 
Help
 
HideBooks
The HideBooks class represents a command to hide one or more books in the library.
HidePatrons
The HidePatrons class represents a command to hide (soft-delete) a list of patrons from the library system.
IssueBookWindow
 
Library
Represents the central model in the Library Management System.
LibraryController
Controller class that handles the execution of various library operations.
LibraryData
The LibraryData class is responsible for loading and storing library data using various DataManagers.
LibraryException
The LibraryException class is a custom exception used within the Library System.
ListBooks
The ListBooks class represents a command to list all available books in the library.
ListLoans
The ListLoans class represents a command to list all active loans in the library.
ListPatrons
The ListPatrons class represents a command to list all patrons in the library.
LoadGUI
 
Loan
The Loan class represents a loan of a book to a patron in the library.
LoanDataManager
Handles loading and storing loan data from/to a text file.
LoanHistoryView
This class is responsible for displaying the loan history in a graphical interface.
Main
The Main class of the Library System application.
MainWindow
The MainWindow class represents the primary user interface of the Library Management System.
MessageDisplayer
 
MockBookDataManager
Manages loading and storing book data from/to a text file.
MockLibraryData
The LibraryData class is responsible for loading and storing library data using various DataManagers.
MockLoanDataManager
Handles loading and storing loan data from/to a text file.
MockPatronDataManager
Manages loading and storing patron data from/to a text file.
Patron
The Patron class represents a patron of the library.
PatronDataManager
Manages loading and storing patron data from/to a text file.
PatronsListView
This class is responsible for displaying the patrons in a graphical interface.
RenewBook
The RenewBook class represents a command to renew a book by a patron.
RenewBookWindow
 
ReturnBook
The ReturnBook class represents a command to return a book by a patron.
ReturnBookWindow
 
ShowBook
The ShowBook class represents a command to display detailed information about a book.
ShowPatron
The ShowPatron class represents a command to display detailed information about a patron.
Validator
Centralized validator class for the library system.
ViewBookDetails
The ViewBookDetails class represents a frame for displaying book details in a table.
ViewPatronDetails
The ViewPatronDetails class represents a frame for displaying patron details in a table.
